VENTURE BANK CHINA & ASIA strategic relationships & capital for China & Asian marketsCHERAY  : luxury brand and a curated portfolio of luxury brands and investments developed internally.REAL ESTATE: My family has owned a luxury boutique real estate firm in the SF Bay now merged with Sotheby's called Decker Bullock SIR.
